Package doa.engine.scene

Class DoaSceneHandler

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaSceneHandler
public final class DoaSceneHandler extends Object
Class is for loading-unloading scenes to DoaEngine. Only one scene can be loaded at a time.
Since:
DoaEngine 2.7
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

    • loadScene

      public static void loadScene​(@NotNull @NotNull String sceneName)
      Loads a scene. If there is already a scene loaded, the loaded scene will be unloaded first.
      Parameters:
      sceneName - unique name of the scene to load

    • loadScene

      public static void loadScene​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaScene scene)

      Parameters:
      scene - scene to load
